amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Community College Board of Governors; membership.
amendatorysection.para: Each community college area shall be governed by a board composed of eleven members. The governing boards shall be known as the Community College Board of Governors for the community college area the board serves.

annotation.para: Chapter 79, article 26, the Technical Community College Area Act, is not in violation of Article VIII, section 1A, of the Constitution. State ex rel. Western Technical Com. Col. Area v. Tallon, 196 Neb. 603, 244 N.W.2d 183 (1976).
